description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL roles.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres role create
commands.summary: Create a new role or updates an existing role.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres role create --cluster-name
                                 --name
                                 --password
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres role delete
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres role delete [--cluster-name]
                                 [--ids]
                                 [--name]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--subscription]
                                 [--yes]

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres role list
commands.summary: List all the roles in a given cluster.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres role show
commands.summary: Get information about a cluster role.
examples: az az cosmosdb postgres role show -n "testrole" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres role update
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres role update [--add]
                                 [--cluster-name]
                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--ids]
                                 [--name]
                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                 [--password]
                                 [--remove]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--set]
                                 [--subscription]
examples: az az cosmosdb postgres role update -n "testrole" --password "newPassword" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres role wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
